properties.displayName: C# IL Code Compilation Via Ilasm.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " /dll" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /exe") and (FolderPath endswith "\\ilasm.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "ilasm.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the use of "Ilasm.EXE" in order to compile C# intermediate (IL) code to EXE or D
